question:
In recent times, the concept of “plug-and-play” projects was making news. Consider the following statements with this respect:
1. All statutory clearances will be obtained by government before awarding the project
2. Plug and Play model ensures that infrastructure projects don’t get delayed
Which among the above is / are correct statements?
explanation: In a bid to ensure that infrastructure projects don’t get stalled and later turn up as non-performing assets, a concept of plug-and-play projects has been conceived where only implementation-ready projects having all clearances in place would be allocated through a transparent auction process in the way coal blocks are being given out.
